draw.overall_supervision_plan: I assess the overall initial risk to be low as a result of an seldom probability of a catastrophic event; I assess the overall residual risk to be low due to an unlikely probability of a catastrophic event.Most Dangerous Risk: Negligent DischargeMitigation: Soldier will use select switch discipline and only place the weapon system on fire prior to engaging targets. Upon completion of each engagement, selector switches will be placed on safe. Safeties will control the direction and safety for each shooter. Most Likely Risk: Slips, Trips, and Falls with Heavy EquipmentMitigation: Ensuring proper PPE is worn during operations and slowing down any nonessential movement to ensure soldiers move heavy equipment through the woods. Part of the mitigation will be to brief about weather conditions and empower soldiers to modify any surface deem unsafe before and during the training event. Moving a controlled rate in order to prevent slips, trips ,and fall.
